text: The 2013 World Sambo Championships was held in Saint Petersburg, Russia between the 21 and 25 November 2013. This tournament included competition in both Sambo, and Combat Sambo. ==Medal overview== ===Combat Sambo Events=== {| |- |rowspan=2| Half-flyweight (52 kg) |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |-
